description: Nice creamy body with nut and honey sweetness.

Isn’t it strange when you order a Breakfast Blend or House Blend or Deluxe Ambiguous Blend that you almost never have any idea what that blend is comprised of? We certainly think so. Knuckles is a blend of beans from Ethiopia, El Salvador, and Sumatra, and we spent a lot of time getting this blend right. And by ‘right’ we mean each variety shines through, and yet the sum is still somehow greater than the parts. You’re not a commodity, don’t settle for commodity mystery blends. Knuckles: because we didn’t come here to screw around.
